reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The app clearly states in its privacy policy that it collects various types of information.
reply.reference: When you use our Services, we collect the following types of information: Information You Provide Us, Account Information, Additional Information. URL: https://www.owaves.com/privacy

source_documents.excerpt:
We believe that transparency is the key to any healthy relationship. At Owaves, we’re all about health. We appreciate that you are trusting us with information that is important to you, and we want to be transparent about how we use it.
Here we describe the privacy practices for our applications, software, websites, APIs, products, and services (the “Services”). You will learn about the data we collect, how we use it, the controls we give you over your information, and the measures we take to ke...

and remains responsible for personal information that we transfer to others who process it on our behalf. If you have a complaint about our Privacy Shield compliance, please contact us. You can also refer a complaint to our chosen independent dispute resolution body JAMS, and in certain circumstances, invoke the Privacy Shield arbitration process. Owaves complies with applicable data protection and privacy regulations, including GDPR and CCPA, and will provide users with their respective rights ...

data. While we take significant steps to safeguard your information, no security system is completely impenetrable, and Owaves cannot guarantee absolute security. If you have a security-related concern, please contact us.
Our International Operations and Data Transfers
We operate internationally and transfer information to the United States and other countries for the purposes described in this policy.
Please note that the countries where we operate may have privacy and data protection laws that...

to other users of the Services; using your notification settings, you can limit the notifications you receive from us; and under your application settings, you can revoke the access of the Apple Health data that you previously connected to your Owaves account.
You may withdraw your consent to the use and sharing of your anonymized and aggregated data at any time by terminating your Owaves account in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Data Retention
We keep your account information, like your n...

other users to find and connect with you. For example, your account contact information allows other users to add you as a friend. When another user has your email or mobile phone number in their contact list or in their friend network on a connected service, we show that user that you are a user of the Services.
Improve, Personalize, and Develop the Services
We use the information we collect to improve and personalize the Services and to develop new ones. For example, we use the information to ...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects information such as account information (name, email, password, mobile number), additional information like logs for food, weight, sleep, water, geolocation data, and information obtained from third parties like exercise or activity data.

content: Account information (name, email, password, mobile number)
Additional information (logs for food, weight, sleep, water)
Information obtained from third parties (exercise or activity data)

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the information provided in the 'Information We Collect' section of the privacy policy, where it details the types of data collected by the app.
reply.reference: The app collects information such as account information (name, email, password, mobile number), additional information like logs for food, weight, sleep, water, geolocation data, and information obtained from third parties like exercise or activity data. URL: https://www.owaves.com/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app clearly declares the purpose of data collection and use, including improving and personalizing services, developing new features, communicating with users, and providing personalized wellness services.
reply.reference: We use the information we collect to improve and personalize the Services and to develop new ones. For example, we use the information to troubleshoot and protect against errors; perform data analysis and testing; conduct research and surveys; and develop new features and Services. URL: https://www.owaves.com/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection and delete their data. Users can withdraw their consent at any time by using account settings and tools, stopping the use of features, removing third-party service access, or deleting their data or account.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to opt out of data collection and delete their data through various mechanisms provided by the app.
reply.reference: You may exercise these rights using your account settings and tools as described in the 'Your Rights To Access and Control Your Personal Data' section. URL: https://www.owaves.com/privacy

If you need further assistance regarding your rights, please contact us through our website, and we will consider your request in accordance w...

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares anonymized and aggregated user data with academic institutions, research entities, healthcare organizations, insurance providers, technology partners, and other third-party collaborators for scientific research, algorithmic development, product improvement, or commercial purposes, including monetization or sale of aggregated, anonymized datasets.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that the app shares anonymized and aggregated user data with various third parties for research, development, and commercial purposes.
reply.reference: We may share anonymized and aggregated user data with academic institutions, research entities, healthcare organizations, insurance providers, technology partners, and other third-party collaborators for scientific research, algorithmic development, product improvement, or commercial purposes, including monetization or sale of aggregated, anonymized datasets. Owaves adheres to the highest industry standards to minimize any risk of personally identifiable information (PII) disclosure. URL: https://www.owaves.com/privacy
